body:
In the Basic Usage and Packaging Guide documentation, several section title underlines were too short. This caused warning messages like:

```
basic_usage.rst:1500: WARNING: Title underline too short.

Limitations of Filesystem Views
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~          <
```

Aside from the warning message, I don't see any other problems this caused.

This bug was discovered in #1576 by adding documentation testing. It will be fixed in #1576. This issue is being opened to track the problem.
title: Documentation: Title underline too short
